name: Acme Monster Surfers Multiplayer Mania: Adventure Cove (Free HD Game)
name_original: Acme Monster Surfers Multiplayer Mania: Adventure Cove (Free HD Game)
description:
Ride endless monster waves as only a cute tiny monster can! Wax your stick and throw on those monster baggies ‘cusp Acme Tiny Monster Surfer wants to hang ten and shoot some sick tubes!

Drive your online opponents crazy while you pile up the bonus points with epic tricks and hardcore stunts!

Very Addicting!

Features:
-Exciting Endless Gameplay
-Cute Tiny Monsters Doing Tricks!
-Epic Waves!
-Endless Summers of Fun!

Unlock More Tiny Monsters!
